title: Water Gun
summaries: The Water Gun is a novelty item that inflicts the Wet debuff on players, enemies, and NPCs for 30 seconds. The Water Gun can be used limitlessly and does not consume any ammunition or mana. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 150 and on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it also has a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to be dropped by the Jungle Mimic in a world with the seed celebrationmk10.
The Water Gun cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have modifiers.

statistics.Tooltip: Squirts a harmless stream of water
